introduction.part1: Evolution Hub offers an innovative collection of AI-powered tools designed specifically for developers and creators. With our AI-powered tools, you can optimize your workflow, automate repetitive tasks, and increase your productivity. Whether you want to generate code, create content, or analyze complex data ‚Äì our platform supports you every step of the way.
introduction.part2: The intelligent combination of artificial intelligence and user-friendly design allows you to unleash your creativity and bring projects to life faster. Discover our powerful features and learn how you can shape the future of software development and content creation with Evolution Hub.
introduction.part3_de: Our advanced algorithms and user-friendly interfaces work together seamlessly to provide you with the best possible developer experience. From the initial idea to the final implementation ‚Äì Evolution Hub accompanies you through every step of your creative process.
introduction.part4_de: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to simplify complex tasks, develop innovative solutions, and take your projects to the next level. With Evolution Hub, you shape the future of digital development.

hero.subtitle: Discover the power of AI-driven tools to streamline your workflow and boost productivity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I change my plan later?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can switch between plans at any time. The change will take effect with your next billing cycle.
faq.question2: Is there a minimum contract term?
faq.answer2: No, all plans can be canceled monthly. There is no contractual commitment.
faq.question3: Can I test the Enterprise version?
faq.answer3: Yes, contact us for a personalized demo and trial period of the Enterprise features.

content_liability.headline: Liability for Content
content_liability.paragraph1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to ¬ß 7 Abs.1 TMG and general laws. According to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
content_liability.paragraph2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the moment of knowledge of a specific infringement. Upon notification of corresponding violations, we will remove this content immediately.

link_liability.headline: Liability for Links
link_liability.paragraph1: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, on whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the contents of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking.
link_liability.paragraph2: However, a permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. Upon notification of violations, we will remove such links immediately.

copyright.headline: Copyright
copyright.paragraph1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.
copyright.paragraph2: Insofar as the content on this page was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, we ask for a corresponding notice. Upon notification of violations, we will remove such content immediately.

image_credits.headline: Image Credits
image_credits.description: The images and graphics used on this website are subject to the copyright of Evolution Hub GmbH or are license-free stock photos from third-party providers.

1.title: 1. Controller
1.description: The controller within the meaning of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other national data protection laws of the member states as well as other data protection regulations is:

2.title: 2. General Information on Data Processing
2.description: We process personal data of our users only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website and our content and services. The processing of personal data of our users regularly takes place only with the user's consent. An exception applies in cases where prior consent cannot be obtained for factual reasons and the processing of the data is permitted by law.

3.title: 3. Provision of the Website and Creation of Log Files
3.subtitle: Description and Scope of Data Processing
3.paragraph1: Each time our website is accessed, our system automatically collects data and information from the computer system of the calling computer.

4.title: 4. Cookies
4.description: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are text files that are stored in the internet browser or by the internet browser on the user's computer system. When a user calls up a website, a cookie can be stored on the user's operating system. This cookie contains a characteristic string of characters that enables the browser to be uniquely identified when the website is called up again.

5.title: 5. Contact Form and Email Contact
5.paragraph1: A contact form is available on our website, which can be used for electronic contact. If a user takes advantage of this option, the data entered in the input mask will be transmitted to us and stored.
5.paragraph2: Alternatively, contact can be made via the provided email address. In this case, the user's personal data transmitted with the email will be stored.

list_items.0: according to Art. 15 GDPR, to request information about your personal data processed by us
list_items.1: according to Art. 16 GDPR, to demand the immediate correction of incorrect or completion of your personal data stored by us
list_items.2: according to Art. 17 GDPR, to demand the deletion of your personal data stored by us
list_items.3: according to Art. 18 GDPR, to demand the restriction of the processing of your personal data
list_items.4: according to Art. 20 GDPR, to receive your personal data that you have provided to us in a structured, common and machine-readable format
list_items.5: according to Art. 7 Para. 3 GDPR, to revoke your once given consent to us at any time
list_items.6: according to Art. 77 GDPR, to complain to a supervisory authority

7.title: 7. Right to Object
7.description: You have the right to object at any time, for reasons arising from your particular situation, to the processing of personal data concerning you which is carried out on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. e or f GDPR.

8.title: 8. Data Security
8.description: We use the widespread SSL (Secure Socket Layer) method within the website visit in conjunction with the highest level of encryption supported by your browser. This is usually 256-bit encryption. If your browser does not support 256-bit encryption, we use 128-bit v3 technology instead.

9.title: 9. Actuality and Amendment of this Privacy Policy
9.description: This privacy policy is currently valid and is dated July 2025. Due to the further development of our website and offers on it or due to changed legal or official requirements, it may become necessary to change this privacy policy.

agb.title: General Terms and Conditions ‚Äì Evolution Hub

1.title: Scope
1.content: These terms govern the use of the services of Evolution Hub and apply to all contracts concluded with Evolution Hub GmbH.

2.title: Conclusion of Contract
2.content: A contract is concluded when you complete the registration or otherwise accept these terms, e.g., by using the service after being notified of these terms.

3.title: Services
3.content: We provide a cloud-based platform and related features. The scope of services is determined by the selected plan and the documentation valid at the time of the contract conclusion.

4.title: Accounts and Security
4.content: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your access data and for all activities in your account. Inform us immediately of any unauthorized use.

5.title: Prices and Payment
5.content: Fees, billing cycles, and payment methods are specified on the pricing page. All prices are in EUR unless otherwise stated. Statutory taxes may apply.

6.title: Term and Termination
6.content: Contracts are concluded for an indefinite period and can be terminated at the end of the current billing period. Termination for cause remains reserved.

7.title: Permissible Use
7.content: You may not misuse the service, interfere with its operation, or violate applicable law. Automated scraping, reverse engineering, or security testing without consent is prohibited.

8.title: Warranty and Liability
8.content: The service is provided within the scope of the selected plan. Our liability is limited to intent and gross negligence, unless mandatory law provides otherwise.

9.title: Intellectual Property
9.content: All intellectual property rights in the service remain with Evolution Hub or its licensors. You receive a simple, non-transferable right of use for the duration of the contract.

10.title: Data Protection
10.content: We process personal data in accordance with our privacy policy. Details on purposes and legal bases can be found under pages.datenschutz.

11.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
11.content: German law applies, excluding the conflict of laws rules. The place of jurisdiction is Berlin, as far as legally permissible.

12.title: Changes to these Terms
12.content: We may adapt these terms to reflect changes in the legal situation or our services. Significant changes will be communicated in advance. Continued use constitutes consent.

11_participation.title: Participation in Dispute Resolution
11_participation.content: We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

hero.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions

items.question: What is EvolutionHub?
items.answer: EvolutionHub is a platform for modern web development with a focus on performance, usability, and modern technologies.

items.question: What technologies are used?
items.answer: We use Astro for the frontend, TypeScript for type-safe development, and Tailwind CSS for styling. Our backend is based on modern JavaScript/TypeScript technologies.

items.question: Is an account required?
items.answer: You need an account for most features. Some areas like the documentation and blog posts can be viewed without an account.

items.question: How is data privacy ensured?
items.answer: We place great importance on data privacy and security. All data is transmitted encrypted and processed in accordance with the GDPR.

items.question: When is support available?
items.answer: Our support team is available from Monday to Friday, 9 a.m. to 6 p.m.

items.question: Can EvolutionHub be used on mobile devices?
items.answer: Yes, our platform is optimized for mobile devices and can be used on smartphones and tablets.

items.question: Is the platform accessible?
items.answer: We are continuously working to improve the accessibility of our platform to make it accessible to all users.

items.question: How do I create an account?
items.answer: Click on 'Register' in the top navigation and follow the instructions. You will need a valid email address.

items.question: How can I reset my password?
items.answer: On the login page, you will find a 'Forgot password' link. Enter your email address and follow the instructions in the email you receive.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Go to your account settings and select 'Manage Subscription'. You can cancel your subscription there.

items.question: What subscription plans are available?
items.answer: We offer various plans tailored to different needs. You can find details on our Pricing page.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and SEPA direct debit.

items.question: How can I recover my account if I lose access?
items.answer: Use the password reset function or contact our support for further assistance.

items.question: How do I manage my notification settings?
items.answer: In your account settings, you can specify which notifications you would like to receive.

items.question: Which browsers are supported?
items.answer: We support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Older browsers may not be fully supported.

items.question: How can I use the API?
items.answer: Our API documentation can be found at /api-docs. You will need an API key, which you can generate in your account settings.

items.question: How do I report a bug?
items.answer: Please use our bug report form at /contact or create an issue in our GitHub repository.

items.question: Are there usage limits for the API?
items.answer: Yes, our API has usage limits to ensure a fair distribution of resources. Details can be found in the API documentation.

items.question: Can I integrate EvolutionHub with third-party tools?
items.answer: Yes, we offer integrations and webhooks for various third-party services.

items.question: What are the system requirements?
items.answer: We recommend using modern browsers and a stable internet connection.

items.question: Are there backup and recovery options?
items.answer: Yes, your data is regularly backed up and can be restored if necessary.
